name: MobileFusionSoft.com
description: Mobilizing Businesses To A New World!
overview:
MobileFusionSoft.com, Inc is a in-house mobile app development company specializing in small businesses. Our apps are designed and developed to help you grow your business by attracting new customers and communicating with existing customers.

Our company has built a robust software from the ground up, which allows us to create iTunes and Android ready apps for your business in less than an hour in some cases. We have one of the fastest turnarounds on the web!

Put very simply, MobileFusionSoft.com, Inc is about putting small businesses on the mobile web with a technology called “applications” apps so they can engage with customers directly on the customer’s mobile phone. This is all accomplished with very little work required on the part of you “the small business owner”.

In short, we do all of the heavy lifting. We will design, create, and update an custom app tailored to your business using our robust mobile web app platform. Our software allows us to do this in 5 easy steps. Once completed, your app will be ready for submission to iTunes and/or Android Marketplace in as little as 2 business days.

In short, we’re a “done for you” mobile web app platform that allows small businesses to easily engage with both new and current customers without needing any programming knowledge or extra time.
